thread.title: Defense leads Red Devils to win over Salem
thread.title_full: Defense leads Red Devils to win over Salem

author: Brett Fowler | Correspondent
title: Defense leads Red Devils to win over Salem
text:
Melinda Pease | MP Sports Pics Martinez makes the tackle 
Loganville junior defensive end Jason Martinez (12) tackles Salem’s Tyriano Greene (32) during the first half of the visiting Red Devils’ 20-9 victory. Melinda Pease | MP Sports Pics Fowler catches for Loganville 
Bryce Fowler (47) catches a 9-yard pass in the red zone for Loganville during the Red Devils’ victory Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, at Salem of Conyers. Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 12:25 am Defense leads Red Devils to win over Salem By Brett Fowler | Correspondent   
CONYERS — “Defense wins championships” is how the saying goes, and Logan­ville’s defense looked like a champion caliber defense Friday night in a 20-9 victory over Salem, putting the Red Devils another step closer to their first state high school football playoffs berth since 2010. 
“Our defense has been playing great all year and they rose to the occasion tonight,” head coach Mike Humphreys said. “Offense kind of struggled a bit, but defense kind of picked up the slack. kAm“%92E’D H92E :E’D 2== 23@FE[ E9@F89 — H96? @?6 D:56 DECF88=6D E96 @E96C D:56 96=AD A:4< E96 @E96C FA]”k^Am kAm{@82?G:==6’D 5676?D6 7@C465 7:G6 EFC?@G6CD[ EH@ @7 H9:49 H6C6 :?E6C46AE:@?D 7@C E@F495@H?D]k^Am kAm$2=6> DECF4< 7:CDE H:E9 2 ag\J2C5 7:6=5 8@2= E@ 8:G6 E96 $6>:?@=6D 2 b\_ =625 :? 2 C2E96C F?6G6?E7F= 7:CDE 92=7]k^Am kAm{@82?G:==6 2?DH6C65 H:E9 2 D4@C6 @7 :ED @H? @?
